nox.midnightconfig.title: Nox Configuration
nox.midnightconfig.noFriendlyFire: Mobs can't damage other Mobs with the same target
nox.midnightconfig.monsterGearScales: Monster gear scales with the closest Player's gear
nox.midnightconfig.blockBreakingHardness: Max hardness level Mobs can mine
nox.midnightconfig.guardianNaturalSpawnW: Guardian natural spawn weight (0 to disable) Note: does not affect Ocean Monument spawns
nox.midnightconfig.spawnGhastsInMoreBiom: Ghasts can spawn in Crimson/Warped Forest
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonsSpawnN: Wither Skeletons spawn in Warped Forests & Soul Sand Valleys
nox.midnightconfig.endermiteFlowerSpawn: Chorus Flowers spawn an Endermite when broken
nox.midnightconfig.sleepExtendToSeaLevel: Sleep check vertical range is extended to sea level
nox.midnightconfig.creepersRunFromShield: Creepers will run from shielding Players
nox.midnightconfig.caveSpiderSlownessBit: Cave Spider slowness bite duration. Set to 0 to disable
The level of slowness Cave Spiders inflict
nox.midnightconfig.endermanBlindnessStar: Length of blindness inflicted by staring at a Enderman. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.endermanBlindnessHitD: Length of blindness inflicted by being hit by a Enderman. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.phantomWeaknessBiteDu: How long a Phantom's weakness bite lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.shulkerBulletBlindnes: How long the blindness effect from Shulker bullets lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.silverfishMiningFatig: How long the mining fatigue effect from Silverfish bites lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeContactFireD: How long the fire effect lasts after coming into contact with a Magma Cube. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.straySlownessLevel: The level of slowness Stray's inflict
nox.midnightconfig.blazeIgnitionAuraRadi: Radius blazes can set you on fire. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.blazeAuraDuration: Length of fire from blaze auras
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonCloudRadiu: Multiplier (* slime size) for poison clouds spawned on Slime death
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonCloudDurat: Divisor (slime size /) for slime poison cloud duration. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonAmplifier: Level of poison inflicted by slime poison clouds
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonsWither: Radius in which Wither Skeletons inflict wither. Set to 0 to disable
Duration of wither effect inflicted by Wither Skeletons aura
nox.midnightconfig.snowGolemInverseAccur: Snow Golem inverse accuracy. Set to 0 for perfect accuracy
nox.midnightconfig.enderDragonIsImmuneTo: Ender Dragon Dragon is immune to explosion damage
nox.midnightconfig.endCrystalsIndestruct: End Crystals (in the fight vicinity) can only be damaged while connected to the Ender Dragon
nox.midnightconfig.buffEnderDragonFireba: Ender Dragon Firaballs have more damage, radius and damage
nox.midnightconfig.endermanTeleportsFrom: Endermen teleport when hit in melee
nox.midnightconfig.guardiansPlaceWaterOn: Guardians place flowing water on death
nox.midnightconfig.guardianDeathLeavesWa: If the above is enabled, Guardians place a water source on death
nox.midnightconfig.evokersImmuneToMagic: Evokers are immune to magical damage
nox.midnightconfig.evokersResistProjecti: Evokers are immune to non-armor-piercing projectiles
nox.midnightconfig.silverfishImmuneToFal: Silverfish are immune to fall damage
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonArchers: Wither skeletons can spawn with Bows
nox.midnightconfig.slimesImmuneToFallDam: Slimes are immune to fall damage
nox.midnightconfig.slimesResistProjectil: Slimes are immune to non-armor-piercing projectiles
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonCloudOnDea: Slimes spawn poison cloud on death
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeAttacksIgnit: Magma Cube attacks set target on fire
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeLeavesLavaWh: Magma Cubes leave Lava when killed
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeMakesLavaSou: Magma Cubes place Lava sources on death. If this is false, non-source Lava is used
nox.midnightconfig.spidersImmuneToFallDa: Spiders are immune to fall damage
nox.midnightconfig.caveSpidersApplySlown: Cave Spider attacks give Slowness III
nox.midnightconfig.witchesFleeToDrink: Witches prevented potion drinking if target is within 7 blocks
nox.midnightconfig.witchesUseLingeringPo: Witches use Lingering Potions instead of Splash Potions
nox.midnightconfig.witchesResistProjecti: Witches ignore damage from non-armor-piercing projectiles
nox.midnightconfig.witherBlockBreakingCo: Wither block breaking cooldown, in ticks
nox.midnightconfig.witherRapidlyBreaksSu: Wither rapidly breaks blocks around itself
nox.midnightconfig.witherCallReinforceme: Cooldown for Wither to summon reinforcements
nox.midnightconfig.witherReinforcementsG: Wither summons X Wither Skeletons as reinforcements
nox.midnightconfig.witherReinforcementsT: Can summon reinforcements if target is within X blocks
